header.title: wxWindowCreateEvent

description.p: This event is sent just after the actual window associated with a wxWindow object has been created.
Since it is derived from wxCommandEvent, the event propagates up the window hierarchy.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxCommandEvent wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxWindowCreateEventType to subscribe to events of this type.
